name: Minecraft PaperMC Server
author: Noobhosting.eu.org
description: An optimized PaperMC server with hibernation support and automatic updates.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

cd /mnt/server

LATEST_VERSION=$(curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper | jq -r '.versions[-1]')
LATEST_BUILD=$(curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper/versions/$LATEST_VERSION | jq -r '.builds[-1]')
JAR_NAME=paper-$LATEST_VERSION-$LATEST_BUILD.jar
DOWNLOAD_URL=https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper/versions/$LATEST_VERSION/builds/$LATEST_BUILD/downloads/$JAR_NAME

curl -o server.jar $DOWNLOAD_URL

echo 'eula=true' > eula.txt
mkdir -p plugins
curl -o plugins/IdleServerShutdown.jar https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/DgUoVPBP/versions/QucVTrXS/IdleServerShutdown-1.3.jar

echo 'Installation complete.'

variables.name: SERVER_MEMORY
variables.description: Amount of memory to allocate to the server.
